title: Anivia
body:
For some reason she is getting nerfed again, can we stop nerfing her?

ty

replies.body: "for some reason" as in being probably the best mid in the game. She has ridiculous teamfight control/AoE with high burst, has high safety throughout the game and is actually really tanky after RoA-Seraph's and her waveclear helps her survive any matchup and stall game. Even assassins don't phase her and she doesn't have any truly bad matchups. I've been saying she was OP for months and it's not something I say casually.

She doesn't have any Bad match-ups?
{{champion:105}} is the ultimate counter to Anivia.

And not just that, there are a lot of champions that are very annoying and I'd almost say a counter, but is probably considered a skill match up: {{champion:38}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} 

Not to mention the champions that can easily deal with Anivia because they can out range and burst her down before she even gets close enough to  E>R: {{champion:268}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:115}}  Which also most of these also have very strong wave clear that can easily clear multiple waves like Anivia with spending like half or maybe even less Mana as her And doesn't have to waste gold on 2 Mana items just to survive.

She is easy to deal with...people just doesn't know how to fight her and take advantage at her many weaknesses that she has...And yes, she has a lot more weaknesses than just "No Mobility".

She has ridiculous teamfight control/AoE with high burst, has high safety throughout the game and is actually really tanky after RoA-Seraph's and her waveclear helps her survive any matchup and stall game. Even assassins don't phase her and she doesn't have any truly bad matchups. I've been saying she was OP for months and it's not something I say casually.

She is one of the above average Mid laners and obviously one of the better overall champions in this game. Her damage is crazy I will agree on but she lacks any sort of mobility so it's just a trade off of damage for mobility. Extremely easy to gank and if put behind she really just falls in an abyss until (if) she can make it to late with full build. I just don't see the hate she is getting from Riot when there are many other champions that are played more that needs nerfs.

Yeah, check out my boards post [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/jtUIq7Oj-anivia-feedback-from-a-seasoned-anivia-main) 

In short offer a compromise, I think the Q changes are completely fair and would offer more of a reward for hitting her skill shot, but the R changes are completely bogus. My proposal is that instead of having the E do full dmg when R is at full size (increasing her burst window by 3 seconds) it should do full dmg when R is at half size or after 1.5 seconds, fairly increasing her burst window by a maximum of 1.5 seconds, also making it impossible to E->R someone by adding a 1.5 second delay between R->E. My full post/article [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/jtUIq7Oj-anivia-feedback-from-a-seasoned-anivia-main) will go over everything in depth.

Anivia is already a high skill cap champion with a pretty low play/ban rate. That deserves some acknowledgement as well.
No. Fuck articuno. Buff moltres and zapdos.
